Package MainGameLogic

Class Island

java.lang.Object
MainGameLogic.Island
public class Island
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements an MainGameLogic.Island that the player can travel to and from. Each MainGameLogic.Island has a Store and Routes that the player can use to travel.
Version:
1.1, 16 April 2021.
Author:
John Elliott

    Initializes an MainGameLogic.Island.

    • setStore

      public void setStore​(Store newStore)
      Sets the Store of the MainGameLogic.Island this is done after the initializes as Store have there own initializes setup.
      Parameters:
      newStore - The new Store being added.

      RouteString The Islands Routes as a String.

    • getRoutesString

      public java.lang.String getRoutesString​(Island newIsland)
      Returns a formatted String of the Islands Routes between the current island and a new island.
      Parameters:
      newIsland - The Island the player is traveling to.
      Returns:
      RouteString The Islands Routes as a String.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(Island currentIsland)
      Returns a formatted String of a islands information and route to another island.
      Parameters:
      currentIsland - The Island the player is traveling to.
      Returns:
      islandInfo Information about a given Islands.

    • getRoutes

      public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes()
      A get method for the islands routes.
      Returns:
      routes A list of the route from this island.

      Returns:
      routes A list of the route from this island.
